tuv.seg: The Seniors Alert Scheme provides grant support for the supply of equipment to enable older people without sufficient means to continue to live securely in their homes
Cuireann an Scéim Rabhaidh do Sheanóirí tacaíocht deontais ar fáil chun trealamh a sholáthar le cur ar chumas daoine scothaosta nach bhfuil dóthain maoine acu maireachtáil go slán ina gcuid tithe
The scheme, which is run by Pobal, replaced the Scheme of Community Support for Older People in May 2010
Tháinig an scéim, atá á reáchtáil ag Pobal, i gcomharba ar an Scéim Tacaíochta Pobail do Dhaoine Scothaosta i mBealtaine 2010
The grant assistance is made available through community and voluntary groups registered with Pobal
Cuirtear an cúnamh deontais ar fáil trí ghrúpaí pobail agus deonacha atá cláraithe le Pobal
Who is eligible for grant support?
Cé atá incháilithe do chúnamh deontais?
The scheme provides assistance to older people
Cuireann an scéim cúnamh ar fáil do dhaoine scothaosta
To be eligible you must be:
Chun a bheith incháilithe ní mór duit a bheith:
• Aged 65 or over and have limited means or resources
• 65 bliain d'aois nó níos mó agus maoin nó acmhainn theoranta a bheith agat
• Living alone or with someone who also meets the eligibility criteria
• Ag maireachtáil i d’aonar nó le duine eile a chomhlíonann na critéir cháilitheachta
• Living in the area covered by the community group administering the grant support
• Ag maireachtáil sa cheantar atá á chlúdach ag an ngrúpa pobail atá ag riaradh an chúnaimh deontais
• Able to benefit from the equipment being supplied
• Ábalta leas a bhaint as an trealamh a chuirtear ar fáil
• Willing to maintain contact with the community group
• Sásta fanacht i dteagmháil leis an ngrúpa pobail
What type of equipment can be supplied?
Cén cineál trealaimh is féidir a chur ar fáil?
Grant support is provided towards the cost of purchasing and installing monitored personal alarms, as well as additional or replacement pendants
Cuirtear cúnamh deontais ar fáil i dtreo na gcostas a bhaineann le trealamh aláraim phearsanta atá faoi mhonatóireacht a cheannach agus a chur isteach
Equipment supplied under the scheme remains the property of the community group
Fanann an trealamh a chuirtear ar fáil faoin scéim faoi úinéireacht an ghrúpa pobail
How is an application for a grant made?
Conas a dhéantar iarratas ar dheontas?
An application for a grant is made by the registered community group for your area
Déanann an grúpa pobail cláraithe i do cheantar iarratas ar dheontas
When a community group identifies an older person in its area as needing assistance, it:
Nuair a aithníonn grúpa pobail duine scothaosta ina gceantar óna dteastaíonn cabhair:
• Assesses the person’s eligibility for the scheme and completes the application form
• Déanann sé measúnú ar incháilitheacht an duine don scéim agus comhlánaíonn sé an fhoirm iarratais
• Identifies the equipment required and obtains quotations from suppliers
• Aithníonn sé an trealamh a theastaíonn agus faigheann sé luachana ó sholáthróirí
• Submits the application with supporting documentation to the Department
• Seolann sé an t iarratas le doiciméid thacaíochta chuig an Roinn
Groups can apply for grants all year round
Is féidir le grúpaí iarratas a dhéanamh ar dheontais ar feadh na bliana ar fad
What groups can register for the scheme?
Cén sórt grúpaí atá in ann clárú don scéim?
Groups wishing to participate in the scheme need to register with Pobal first
Ní mór do ghrúpaí ar mian leo páirt a ghlacadh sa scéim clárú le Pobal ar dtús
Community, voluntary and not-for-profit organisations are eligible to register
Tá eagraíochtaí pobail, deonacha agus neamhbhrabúis i dteideal clárú
They must have a recognised structure and be able to demonstrate a capability of managing the grants
Ní mór dóibh struchtúr aitheanta a bheith acu agus a bheith ábalta a léiriú go bhfuil an cumas acu na deontais a bhainistiú
They must also have a record of working with older people in the community
Ní mór dóibh cuntas teiste a bheith acu ag obair le daoine scothaosta sa phobal freisin
A group will not be able to register where there is an existing group operating the scheme in the area
Ní bheidh grúpa ábalta clárú sa chás go bhfuil grúpa i mbun na scéime sa cheantar cheana féin
If you feel you may be eligible for grant support you should contact the group registered to operate the scheme in your area
Má cheapann tú go bhféadfá a bheith i dteideal cúnamh deontais a fháil ba chóir duit dul i dteagmháil leis an ngrúpa atá cláraithe chun an scéim a fheidhmiú i do cheantar
You can contact Pobal at the address below for contact details
Is féidir leat teagmháil a dhéanamh le Pobal ag an seoladh thíos le haghaidh sonraí teagmhála
Pobal has information on groups that are registered (pdf) on its website
Tá faisnéis maidir leis na grúpaí atá cláraithe (pdf) ar shuíomh gréasáin Phobal
Pobal does not accept applications from individuals for grant support
Ní ghlacann Pobal le hiarratais ó dhaoine aonair chun cúnamh deontais a fháil
Groups wishing to register for the scheme can register online at https://sas.pobal.ie
Ba chóir do ghrúpaí ar mian leo clárú don scéim a chlárú ar líne ag https://sas.pobal.ie
Further information on the scheme is available on Pobal’s website
Tá tuilleadh eolais maidir leis an scéim ar fáil ar láithreán gréasáin Phobal
Contact the Seniors Alert Scheme section in Pobal at the address below or by email at onlinesupport@pobal.ie for further information
Téigh i dteagmháil leis an alt Scéim Rabhaidh do Sheanóirí sa Phobal ag an seoladh thíos nó trí ríomhphost ag onlinesupport@pobal.ie chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil
